name: Clouds' Maze
description:
Marcel, a friendly basketball ball, finds himself in a strange maze and when he tries to get out, he finds that he is not the only one.

This is a puzzle platformer 3D game in witch you control two characters, one by one, into a maze trying to get to the exit.

It is a one week project for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 and it is inspired from a 2004 game called Balance.

Controls:

  - Arrow Keys / WASD to move;

  - Space to switch between characters;

  - R to restart to the last check point;

You have to get both characters to their check points in order to save the progress. Good luck, and don't be frustrated to lose a few times.

Tip: Be shore that your current character is safe before switching to the other one, you can use the walls' corners.
